Smart Thermos: Develop a thermos that is connected to a smartphone app. The app can monitor the temperature inside the thermos and notify the user when it reaches the desired temperature. It can also suggest recipes based on the contents of the thermos.
Self-Cleaning Thermos: Create a thermos that automatically cleans itself after each use. This can be done by using a self-cleaning mechanism that removes any residue or stains from the thermos.
Multi-Temperature Thermos: Develop a thermos that can maintain multiple temperatures at the same time. This can be useful for keeping coffee hot and tea cold at the same time.
Thermos with Built-In Straws: Create a thermos with built-in straws that can be easily removed and cleaned. This can make it more convenient for users to use the thermos on-the-go.
Thermos with Solar Panels: Develop a thermos that is powered by solar panels. This can allow users to keep their drinks warm without the need for electricity.
